verses.verse: וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they took their journey מֵֽאֵילִ֔ם <WH362> me-'ei-Lim, from Elim וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat and all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> mid-bar- unto the wilderness סִ֔ין <WH5512> Sin, of Sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בֵּין־ <WH996> bein- is between אֵילִ֖ם <WH362> 'ei-Lim which [is] between Elim וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> u-Vein is between סִינָ֑י <WH5514> si-Nai; and Sinai בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> ba-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen יוֹם֙ <WH3117> yOm day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, of the second לְצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> le-tze-Tam after their departing out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

[are] not against us but against the LORD
